quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: Technology is best when it brings people together.
quotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Code is poetry written for computers.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The future is built by those who create.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Together, we build. Together, we innovate.
quotes.author: DevNest

quotes.text: Every expert was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Unknown
